title: Senior Level Full-Stack Developer
description: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Level Full-Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our web applications, working on both the front-end and back-end. The ideal candidate has a passion for creating clean, efficient code and a desire to solve complex problems.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain scalable web applications using the MERN stack.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing software.
Participate in code reviews to maintain high-quality code.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in full-stack development.
Proficiency with Node.js, Express, React, and MongoDB.
Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.
Experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure).
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
Flexible working hours and remote work options.
Generous paid time off and company holidays.
educationLevel: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Creative Minds Studio is looking for a talented UI/UX Designer to create amazing user experiences. The ideal candidate should have an eye for clean and artful design, possess superior UI/UX skills, and be able to translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and artifacts.
responsibilities: Design user-centric interfaces for web and mobile applications.
Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, and site maps.
Collaborate with product management and engineering to define and implement innovative solutions.
requirements: Proven UI/UX design experience with a strong portfolio.
Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.
Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction.
benefits: A creative and collaborative work environment.
educationLevel: Degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction or related field

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Join our marketing team as an intern and gain hands-on experience in SEO, content marketing, and social media campaigns. This is a great opportunity for a student or recent graduate looking to start a career in digital marketing.
responsibilities: Assist with SEO research and content creation.
Help manage social media channels.
Support the marketing team in daily administrative tasks.
requirements: Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a Marketing, Communications, or related program.
Strong desire to learn along with professional drive.
Familiarity with social media platforms.

title: Frontend Developer
description: We are seeking a talented frontend developer to join our growing team.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain React.js applications
Collaborate with UI/UX designers
Ensure responsive design implementation
requirements: 2+ years of frontend development
Proficiency in React and TypeScript

title: Marketing Intern
description: Support the marketing team in digital campaigns and branding initiatives.
responsibilities: Assist in social media content creation
Coordinate with designers and copywriters
Track analytics and generate reports
requirements: Strong written communication skills
Familiarity with Canva and Instagram

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We're looking for a creative UI/UX designer to enhance our mobile app experience.
responsibilities: Design wireframes and prototypes
Collaborate with developers and product team
Conduct user research
requirements: Experience with Figma or Adobe XD
Portfolio of previous design work

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze and interpret data to support business decisions.
responsibilities: Create dashboards and data visualizations
Work with business units to gather data needs
Perform data cleaning and preprocessing
requirements: Strong SQL and Excel skills
Experience with Power BI or Tableau

title: Sales Executive
description: Drive sales and expand our customer base in the local region.
responsibilities: Identify leads and convert to customers
Achieve monthly sales targets
Report sales metrics to manager
requirements: Excellent communication skills
Experience in B2B or B2C sales
